title: Define and Maintain Role-Based Access Control Define and maintain role-based access control, through determining and v8 documenting the access rights necessary for each role within the enterprise to ● successfully carry out its assigned duties. Perform access control reviews of enterprise assets to validate that all privileges are authorized, on a recurring schedule at a minimum annually, or more frequently.
Ensure that local logging has been enabled on all systems and networking
audit_procedure: v7 ● ● ● Ensure that local logging has been enabled on all systems and networking devices. Page 114

title: Enable Detailed Logging
audit_procedure: Force audit policy subcategory settings (Windows Vista or later) to override audit policy category settings
remediation_procedure: To establish the recommended configuration via GP, set the following UI path to Enabled: Computer Configuration\Policies\Windows Settings\Security Settings\Local Policies\Security Options\
default_value: Enabled. (Advanced Audit Policy Configuration settings will be used for auditing configuration, and legacy Audit Policy configuration settings will be ignored.)

title: Ensure adequate storage for logs
audit_procedure: Navigate to the UI Path articulated in the Remediation section and confirm it is set as prescribed. This group policy setting is backed by the following registry location with a REG_DWORD value of 0.
